meanings.definition: A medical instrument used to examine the ear.
meanings.sent1: Doctors use otoscopes to look inside ears during check-ups.
meanings.sent2: The clinic purchased new otoscopes for the ENT department.
meanings.sent3: The otoscopes whispered secrets about the patients' ears to the doctors.
meanings.sent4: The otoscopes were like tiny detectives investigating the mysteries of the ear canal.
meanings.sent5: The shiny otoscopes illuminated the dark depths of the ear, revealing any hidden issues.

meanings.sent1: The hospital stored multiple otoscopes in the medical supply room.
meanings.sent2: Nurses grabbed the otoscopes to assist the doctors in the examination rooms.
meanings.sent3: The otoscopes gathered for a group photo, each one smiling brightly.
meanings.sent4: The otoscopes stood in a row, like soldiers ready for duty.
meanings.sent5: The collection of otoscopes gleamed on the shelves, waiting to be used.
